Flow.description: v2 - added close date update for newly closed deals v3 - Slack testing v6 - Slack ready v7 - Slack message edits v8 - Added CS Slack alert v9 - Added CS Slack alert debug (removed filter for closed opps) v10 - CS Slack alert message edits v11 - Added next step updated date v14 - Added "Last stage before lost" update v16 - Added POC checkbox update v17 - Added lost to competitor slack message v18 - Lost to competitor slack message debug v19 - Lost to competitor slack message edits v20 - Added CS Closed Won Slack alert v21 - Added Account owner update v22 - Added Account contract update v23 - Added upsell opp filter for Slack message v25 - Added upsell opp filter for Account contract update v26 - Added update to Type based on record type upsell v27 - Updated opp filter for Slack message v28 - Debugging owner mismatch v29 - Slack updates v30 - Post Closed Won Alert to Finance Slack v31 - Added customer tiers v32 - Added Atlan product instance v33 - Added SE round robin v34 - Added Lead Status update v35 - Slack message edits v37 - Added expansion/contraction revenue v40 - Updated SE assignment and removed SE Slack alert v41 - Moved Business Value triggers to own flow v43 - Moved Customer Tier to be set at Contracting & Procurement stage v44 - Moved closed lost alert to alerts-gtmreports v45 - Removed Pilots from Closed Won Slack alert v46 - Moved contracting Slack alert to intel channel v47 - Debug expansion/contraction renewal contract calculation v48 - Last Stage Before Lost debug v49 - Added Slack alert to Uriel v50 - Changed to new alerts-gtmreports channel v51 - Added date stamp fields for Stage and POC Stage v52 - Added AE to Account v53 - Slack lost opp alert
Flow.label: On Opp Update
